## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)

## Checklist

- [ ] All tests pass (`pnpm test` and/or `uv run pytest`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`pnpm lint` and/or `uv run ruff check .`)
